abstractText: A modern Nepalese multi-text paper manuscript in the accordion book format containing the Naipalīyadevatāstutikalyāṇapañcaviṃśatikā, Bhadracarīmahāpraṇidhānarāja, Āryāvṛtta and the Saptabuddhastotra.
abstractShort: A modern Nepalese multi-text paper manuscript in the accordion book format containing the Naipalīyadevatāstutikalyāṇapañcaviṃśatikā,
title: Naipalīyadevatāstutikalyāṇapañcaviṃśatikā, Bhadracarīmahāpraṇidhānarāja, Āryāvṛtta, Saptabuddhastotra
